text: @seanspicer @KarrenEricson @MikeBloomberg Hey spicy The "game changer" opportunity was back in January when CDC put out its warning about the virus and the 1st patient was diagnosed in Seattle. But instead @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump& the Republican Trump Bobbleheads were calling #CoronavirusPandemic a Phuckin HOAX!!!!
